nodes.text: The Zuggit system was located within the Trailing Sectors portion of the Inner Rim.

The Zuggit system was introduced in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square M-13. In "The New Wonder Column" section of the thirty-second issue of the Star Wars Insider magazine, published in 1997, Star Wars actor Anthony Daniels made a tongue-in-cheek reference to a "twelve foot, twin-headed, magenta alien from the Planet Zuggit."
